text: NGC 187 is a barred spiral galaxy located around 3.2 million light-years away in the constellation Cetus, although it can refer to our Milky Way. This galaxy has a stretching bond of clouds in which there's a possibility for stars to be born for as long as that is possible. It was discovered in 1893 by William Herschel. ==Observing NGC 187== This galaxy will be monitored by the astronomer for some information needed and be verified for the good matter. ==References== 0187 Category:Barred spiral galaxies Category:Cetus (constellation)
title: NGC 187
